description: This file is the entry point for a React application, responsible for rendering the main App component into the DOM. It initializes the root element and wraps the app in React.StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React component tree into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM under the specified root.
